item.title: Berlin: Lindyhop & Charleston „back to the basics“
item.dc:creator: tobi
item.description: Neuer Lindy Hop/Charleston Kurs mit Daniel Ludevig: „Back to the Basics“ Saturday February 11th 14:00-16:30 @ Heinrich Roller Str 9, Klingel Ludevig Lindyhop & charleston ‚back to the basics‘: Get back into some great basic partner figures for charleston and lindyhop. Open to all beginners we will review basic lindyhop and charleston counts, walks, turns and hops as well as some rhythm […]
